author: jsign
content:
Do we know how participants in _phase 2_ will contribute regarding the _flow_ of contribution?
As in, _phase 1_ (now) we have this login+polling+send through some APIs provided by the sequencer.

How is this going to work for _phase 2_?  Maybe only Github/EthAddrs are whitelisted for login and the flow is the same? 
Or maybe each _phase 2 contributor_ will have an upfront reserved slot or specially assigned token?

[Context for my question: I'm helping a phase2 participant on using my client with some extra changes for his use-case. Maybe it will be useful for others too]

author: robocopsgonemad
content: i'd like to present this for review, am looking for comments and suggestions for improvements to a special contribution process. https://hackmd.io/@RoboCopsGoneMad/Bk3zqWDij
